title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 38.20 - Waiver in cases of hardship
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 38.20 - Waiver in cases of hardship

State Regulations

Upon a showing of reasonable necessity, the State

Comptroller may modify or waive compliance with provisions of this Part, provided that strict compliance is not required by any law or other regulation
and failure to modify or waive compliance would, in the opinion of the

Comptroller, cause a municipality or school district undue
hardship. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2
ยง
38.20

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
